Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.1218 and A.1790, legislation that would link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index. (S.1218 and A.1790)

Items.Title: Oversight: The Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption Program: Examining Strategies for Improving the Administration of SCRIE.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight: The Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption Program: Examining Strategies for Improving the Administration of SCRIE.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Aging

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing the maximum income level qualifying for exemption from rent increases granted to certain senior citizens.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign S.1218 and A.1790, legislation that would link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Link income threshold increases for the senior citizen rent increase exemption (SCRIE) program to changes in the consumer price index. (S.1218 and A.1790)

Items.Title: Oversight: The Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption Program: Examining Strategies for Improving the Administration of SCRIE.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight: The Senior Citizen Rent Increase Exemption Program: Examining Strategies for Improving the Administration of SCRIE.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Arroyo, Treyger, Deutsch, Chin, Vallone, Rose and Koslowitz
